short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OneAD Tag Assistant is designed to assist users in validation of OneAD Pixel tags on their websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OneAD Tag Assistant is a Chrome extension designed to assist users in the management and validation of OneAD Pixel tags on their websites.
